text: phir yadi gyaan ho jaaye ki ve donon (saakshee) kisee paap ke adhikaaree hue hain, to un donon ke sthaan par do any gavaah khade ho jaayen, unamen se, jinaka adhikaar pahale donon ne dabaaya hai aur ve donon shapath len ki hamaaree gavaahee un donon kee gavaahee se adhik sahee hai aur hamane koee atyaachaar nahin kiya hai. yadi kiya hai, to (nihsandeh) ham atyaachaaree hain
